mapper.select: SELECT u.userId, u.sex, u.userName, u.avatar, f.remark, u.signature, COALESCE(fg.id, '') AS groupId, COALESCE(fg.name, '') AS groupName, COALESCE(fg.sort, '') AS groupSort FROM friends f LEFT JOIN friendgroup fg ON f.groupId = fg.id LEFT JOIN user u ON f.friendId = u.userId WHERE f.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY fg.sort DESC
